Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class Description
    org.jsoup.nodes.BooleanAttribute
    just use null values (vs empty string) for booleans.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method Description
    org.jsoup.parser.Tag.canContainBlock()
    No longer used, and no different result than {Tag.isBlock()}
    org.jsoup.nodes.TextNode.createFromEncoded(String, String)
    use TextNode.createFromEncoded(String) instead, as LeafNodes don't carry base URIs.
    org.jsoup.nodes.Entities.getCharacterByName(String)
    does not support characters outside the BMP or multiple character names
    org.jsoup.nodes.Attribute.isBooleanAttribute()  
    org.jsoup.parser.Parser.parseBodyFragmentRelaxed(String, String)
    Use Parser.parseBodyFragment(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) or Parser.parseFragment(java.lang.String, org.jsoup.nodes.Element, java.lang.String) instead.
    org.jsoup.select.NodeTraversor.traverse(Node)
    Just use the static NodeTraversor.filter(NodeFilter, Node) method.
    org.jsoup.Connection.Request.validateTLSCertificates()  
    org.jsoup.Connection.Request.validateTLSCertificates(boolean)
    as distributions (specifically Google Play) are starting to show warnings if these checks are disabled.
    org.jsoup.Connection.validateTLSCertificates(boolean)
    as distributions (specifically Google Play) are starting to show warnings if these checks are disabled.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    org.jsoup.nodes.Comment(String, String)  
    org.jsoup.nodes.DataNode(String, String)
    use DataNode(String) instead
    org.jsoup.nodes.DocumentType(String, String, String, String)  
    org.jsoup.nodes.DocumentType(String, String, String, String, String)  
    org.jsoup.select.NodeTraversor(NodeVisitor)
    Just use the static NodeTraversor.filter(NodeFilter, Node) method.
    org.jsoup.nodes.TextNode(String, String)
    use TextNode(String)
    org.jsoup.nodes.XmlDeclaration(String, String, boolean)
